snippet: Cory Stearns will dance with the Royal Ballet and the soloist Isabella Boylston will dance in the Royal Danish Ballet's "Nutcracker."
abstract: Cory Stearns will dance with the Royal Ballet and the soloist Isabella Boylston will dance in the Royal Danish Ballet's "Nutcracker."

headline.main: American Ballet Theater Announces Dancer Exchange
headline.print_headline: American Ballet Theater Sets Dancer Exchange
